programme.title: Transform My Meal: Italy
programme.desc: Four Italian Olympic athletes meet up with world-class chefs in Rome, Udine, Brescia and Piedmont to introduce more variety into their training diet.

programme.title: Women's 1500m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 1500m Freestyle was held on 31/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Katie LeDecky (USA) claimed Gold with an Olympic record time of 15:30.02 seconds, Anastasiia Kirpichnikova (FRA) took Silver, and Isabel Gose (GER) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 200m Breaststroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 200m Breaststroke was held on 31/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Leon Marchand (FRA) claimed Gold with a new Olympic Record of 2:05.85, Zac Stubblety-Cook (AUS) took Silver and Casper Corbeau (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 100m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 100m Freestyle was held on 31/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Zhanle Pan (CHN) claimed Gold with a new World Record time of 46.40 seconds, Kyle Chalmers (AUS) took Silver, and David Popovici (ROU) completed the podium.

programme.title: The Vault: Julien Alfred, the shoes of Cuba’s wrestling legend, Mexico 1968’s iconic design
programme.desc: Jeannette and Rob discovers Julien Alfred’s kit in The Vault, recently collected at Paris Olympics. The Saint Lucian sprint sensation has overcome many personal challenges to win the first ever gold medal for the Caribbean Island in the 100m final. Rob discovers the magic of a seemingly ordinary dollar bill, in the equestrian community while we learn about the iconic design of Mexico 1968.

programme.title: The Vault: Rebeca Andrade, rare items from the cancelled Tokyo 1940 Games, Olympic torches & swimwear throughout the years
programme.desc: Rebeca Andrade and Simon Biles leotards back-to-back in The Vault take us to the amazing world of gymnastics at the Olympics. We meet the Brazilian queen of gymnastics in training in San Paolo who shared her emotion in dethroning the American legend in the Floor event at Paris 2024 in her sparkling yellow kit. Rob explores a small but very rare collection of objects from the cancelled 1940 Tokyo Games while Jeannette finds herself in the Olympic torch room.

programme.title: Finals | Cycling BMX | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Cycling BMX Freestyle Finals took place on 31/07/2024 at La Concorde, Paris. In the Women's Final, Deng Yawen (CHN) took the Gold, Perris Benegas (USA) took the Silver, and Natalya Diehm (AUS) took the Bronze. In the Men's Final, Jose Torres Gil (ARG) won Gold, Kieran Darren David Reilly (GBR) won Silver, and Anthony Jeanjean (FRA) won Bronze.

programme.title: All Around | The Tokyo 2020 Journey Ends with Gold
programme.desc: In this final episode of the series All Around, ROC’s Angelina Melnikova revisits the details of her triumph at Tokyo 2020 and looks back at the journey that brought her to win three Olympic medals in artistic gymnastics. USA’s Morgan Hurd and China’s Chen Yile follow the Games from home as they consider their plans for their future in gymnastics and overall life. The episode also looks back at the Tokyo 2020 Olympic Games qualifiers.

programme.title: The Distance | Five Rings Films
programme.desc: The story of an enduring Japanese marathon tradition and a humble champion named Naoko Takahashi who captured her nation’s imagination with a run for the ages at the 2000 Olympic Games.

programme.title: Track and Field - Day 9 - Morning | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 04/08/2024 at the Stade de France, Paris. It includes the Women's 3000m Steeplechase Round 1, Women's Hammer Throw Qualification - Group A, Women's 200m Round 1, Men's Long Jump Qualification, Women's Hammer Throw Qualification - Group B,Men's 110m Hurdles Round 1, Women's 400m Hurdles Round 1, Men's 400m Round 1

programme.title: Track and Field - Day 9 - Afternoon | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 04/08/2024 at the Stade de France, Paris. It includes the Finals for Men's 100m, Men's Hammer Throw and Women's Hight Jump, the Semi-Finals for Men's 1500m, Women's 800m, and Men's 100m. At the Women's High jump Final, the Gold was claimed by Yaroslava Mahuchikh (UKR), Nicola Olyslagers (AUS) took the Silver, and the Bronze went to Iryna Gerashchenko (UKR) and Eleanor Patterson (AUS). At the Men's Hammer Throw Final, Ethan Katzberg (CAN) took the Gold, while Bence Halasz (HUN) claimed the Silver, and Mykhaylo Kokhan (UKR) won the Bronze. Finally, at the Men's 100m Final the Gold medal was claimed by Noah Lyles (USA), while the Silver went to Kishane Thompson (JAM) and the Bronze was taken by Fred Kerley (USA).

programme.title: Men's Final | Triathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Men's Triathlon Final took place on day five of the Olympic Games Paris 2024 at Pont Alexandre III on July 31, 2024 in Paris, France.
Alex Yee (GBR) won Gold, Hayden Wilde (NZL) won Silver and Leo Bergere (FRA) won Bronze.

programme.title: Track and Field - Day 10 - Morning | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Track and Field Day 10 Morning Session took place at the Stade de France, France, on 05/08/24. It included Men´s 400m Hurdles Round 1, Men´s Discus Throw Qualification - Group A and B, Women´s Pole Vault Qualification, Women´s 400m Hurdles Repechage Round, Men´s 400m Repechage Round, Women´s 400m Round 1 and Women´s 200m Repechage Round.

programme.title: Track and Field - Day 10 - Afternoon | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Track and Field Day 10 Afternoon Session took place at the Stade de France, France, on 05/08/24. It included the Finals for: Men´s Pole Vault, in which Armand Duplantis (SWE) claimed the Gold, while the Silver went to Sam Kendricks (USA) and the Bronze, to Emmanouil Karalis (GRE). Women's Discus Throw, where we saw Valarie Allman (USA) won the Gold medal, Feng Bin (CHN) won the Silver and Sandra Elkasevic (CRO) took the Bronze. Women's 5000m, where Beatrice Chebet (KEN) claimed Gold and Team mate Faith Kipyegon (KEN) Silver, while the Bronze went to Sifan Hassan (NED). And at the Women's 800m Final, Keely Hodgkisnon (GBR) won the Gold, Tsige Duguma (ETH) Silver, and Mary Moraa (KEN) the Bronze. The session also included Men's 3000 Steeplechase Round 1, Men's 200m Round 1, and the Women's 200m Semi-Final.

programme.title: The Distance | Five Rings Films
programme.desc: The story of an enduring Japanese marathon tradition and a humble champion named Naoko Takahashi who captured her nation’s imagination with a run for the ages at the 2000 Olympic Games.

programme.title: Track and Field - Day 8 - Afternoon | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 07/08/2024 at the Stade de France, Paris. It includes the Finals for Women's Long Jump, Men's 200m, Men's Javelin Throw, Women's 400m Hurdles and Men's 110m Hurdles. It also includes the Women's Heptathlon 200m and Shot Put, and the Women's 1500m Semi-Final.

programme.title: Mixed Relay Final | Triathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Mixed Relay Triathlon Final took place at Pont Alexandre III on August 5, 2024 in Paris, France. Germany claimed Gold, United States Silver, and Great Britain completed the podium.

programme.title: Running in North Korea | Film
programme.desc: A new Original documentary that captures the incredible journey of Aimee Fuller and Mirjam Jaeger as they travel to Pyongyang to participate in the 2019 Mangyongdae Prize International Marathon and meet fellow Olympians from the Democratic People’s Republic of Korea.

programme.title: Track and Field - Day 11 - Morning | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 06/08/2024 at the Stade of France. It includes the Women's 200m and 800m Finals, the Men's Pole Vault Final, the Women's Hammer Throw Final, the Men's 400m Hurdles Victory Ceremony, the Women's Long Jump Victory Ceremony, the Men's 200m Semifinals as well as the Men's 110m Hurdles and 5000m Rounds 1 and the Men's Shot Put Qualifying Round.

programme.title: Track and Field - Day 11 - Afternoon | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 06/08/2024 at the Stade of France. It included the Women's 400m Hurdles Semi-Final, and Men's 400m Semi-Final. Later, at the Women's Hammer Throw Final, Camryn Rogers (CAN) claimed the Gold medal. At the Men's Long Jump Final, Miliadis Tentoglou (GRE) won the Gold. Then came the Men's 1500m Final, where Cole Hocker (USA) claimed victory and the Gold medal. At the Women's 3000m Steeplechase Final, it was Winfred Yavi (BRN) who came in first and took the Gold. Finally, at the Women's 200m Final, the Gold was claimed by Gabrielle Thomas (USA).

programme.title: Men's 400m Hurdles Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 400m Hurdles Final took place at Stade de France, on 09/08/24. Rai Benjamin (USA) won Gold with a time of 46.46 seconds. Karsten Warholm (NOR) won Silver and Alison dos Santos (BRA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 100m Hurdles Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 100m Hurdles Final took place at Stade de France, on 10/08/24. Masai Russell (USA) won Gold with a time of 12.33 seconds. Cyrena Samba-Mayela (FRA) won Silver and Jasmine Camacho-Quinn completed the podium.

programme.title: Anatomy of: Archery, Rhythmic Gymnastics, and Marathon
programme.desc: In a sports science lab, we studied the physiques of archer Atanu Das, rhythmic gymnast Ekaterina Selezneva, and marathon runner Desiree Linden to find out what makes them special at their sports.

programme.title: Men's Marathon | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Men's Marathon starts at Paris City Hall and finishes on the Esplanade des Invalides, Paris on 10/08/24.
The Golden medal was for Tamirat Tola (ETH), Bashir Abdi was the Silver medal (BEL), Benson Kipruto (KEN) won the Bronze medal.

programme.title: Final Women's 400m Hurdles | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 400m Hurdles Final took place at Stade de France, on 08/08/24. Sydney McLaughlin-Levrone (USA) won Gold with a World Record time of 50.37 seconds. Anna Cockrell (USA) won Silver, and Femke Bol (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 110m Hurdles Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 110m Hurdles Final took place at Stade de France, on 08/08/24. Grant Holloway (USA) won Gold with a time of 12.99 seconds. Daniel Roberts (USA) won Silver, and Rasheed Broadbell (JAM) completed the podium.

programme.title: Marathon Race Walk Mixed Relay | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Marathon Race Walk Mixed Relay took place at the Trocadero, Paris, on 07/08/24. Martin A/Perex M (ESP) won the Gold with a time of 2:50:31 hours. Pintado BD/Morejon G (ECU) claimed Silver, and Cowley R/Montag J (AUS) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's Final | Triathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Women's Triathlon Final took place on day five of the Olympic Games Paris 2024 at Pont Alexandre III on July 31, 2024 in Paris, France.
Cassandre Beaugrand (FRA) won first place, Julie Derron (SUI) won second place and Beth Potter (GBR) took third place.

programme.title: Mixed Relay Final | Triathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Mixed Relay Triathlon Final took place at Pont Alexandre III on August 5, 2024 in Paris, France. Germany claimed Gold, United States Silver, and Great Britain completed the podium.
